mapper.select: SELECT RELATION_ID "relationId", O.ORGANIZATION_ID "organizationId", O.ORGANIZATION_NAME "organizationName", S.SUPPLIER_ID "supplierId", SUPPLIER_NAME "supplierName", M.MATERIALS_ID "materialsId", MATERIALS_NAME "materialsName", TAX_RATE "taxRate", O1.ORGANIZATION_ID "receiveOrganizationId", O1.ORGANIZATION_NAME "receiveOrganizationName" FROM SMSCKE_SM_RELATION R LEFT JOIN SMSCKE_ORGANIZATION O ON R.ORGANIZATION_ID=O.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN SMSCKE_ORGANIZATION O1 ON R.RECEIVE_ORGANIZATION_ID=O1.ORGANIZATION_ID ,SMSCKE_SUPPLIER S,SMSCKE_MATERIALS M WHERE R.SUPPLIER_ID=S.SUPPLIER_ID AND R.MATERIALS_ID=M.MATERIALS_ID

SELECT RELATION_ID "relationId", O.ORGANIZATION_ID "organizationId", O.ORGANIZATION_NAME "organizationName", S.SUPPLIER_ID "supplierId", SUPPLIER_NAME "supplierName", M.MATERIALS_ID "materialsId", MATERIALS_NAME "materialsName", TAX_RATE "taxRate", O1.ORGANIZATION_ID "receiveOrganizationId", O1.ORGANIZATION_NAME "receiveOrganizationName" FROM SMSCKE_SM_RELATION R LEFT JOIN SMSCKE_ORGANIZATION O ON R.ORGANIZATION_ID=O.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN SMSCKE_ORGANIZATION O1 ON R.RECEIVE_ORGANIZATION_ID=O1.ORGANIZATION_ID ,SMSCKE_SUPPLIER S,SMSCKE_MATERIALS M WHERE R.SUPPLIER_ID=S.SUPPLIER_ID AND R.MATERIALS_ID=M.MATERIALS_ID AND RELATION_ID=#{relationId}
